hello.title: Hello, {name}!
hello.subtitle: What a great day to give somebody a hand!

actions.question: What are we doing today?
actions.dialog.header: There are 2 options - to give or to ask for a hand.
actions.dialog.explanation: To give a hand means to help somebody (volunteer) and to ask for a hand mean to request help (need help).
actions.dialog.note.one: Please take into account there is no shame to ask for help. We are all humans and we all need help sometimes.
actions.dialog.note.location: Exact location of any user is not accurately reflected on the map to protect your and others privacy. More information can be found in the request form or by clicking on app logo at the top-right corner.

about.title: About you

Tell us a bit more about yourself. People will see this information when they see your request.
